controls_if.tooltip: If the condition is true, execute the statement block

controls_ifelse.tooltip: If the condition is true, execute the first block; otherwise, execute the second block

controls_switch.tooltip: Execute corresponding statement block based on value matching

logic_compare.tooltip: Compare two values, return true or false

logic_operation.tooltip: Logical operation, return true or false

logic_negate.tooltip: Returns true if the input is false, returns false if the input is true

logic_ternary.tooltip: Check the condition. If true, return the first value; otherwise, return the second value
